page-start-meta-description: Your gateway to the world of ethereum
page-start-subtitle: Ethereum is so much more than just trading tokens on an exchange. Step into the new world yourself and learn all the basics in just few steps.
page-start-share-section-title: Do you know anyone who needs help to onboard?
page-start-share-section-description: Billions can't open bank accounts or freely use their money. Ethereum's financial system is always open and unbiased.
